amendment.description: To provide for an investment screening mechanism relating to covered sectors.

action.text: Amendment SA 931 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 6. Record Vote Number: 196.
Amendment SA 931 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3510-3512) To provide for an investment screening mechanism relating to covered sectors.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 931 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 931 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 6. Record Vote Number: 196.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 931 under the order of 7/20/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 6. Record Vote Number: 196.
